items.name: Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds
items.description: Experience high-quality sound and convenience with these sleek wireless earbuds. Perfect for on-the-go music enthusiasts.

items.name: Smart Fitness Tracker
items.description: Track your daily activities, monitor your heart rate, and achieve your fitness goals with this advanced smart fitness tracker.

items.name: Coffee Maker with Built-in Grinder
items.description: Start your day right with freshly ground coffee. This coffee maker features a built-in grinder for a rich and aromatic morning brew.
